text: Another BET Awards show has come and gone and although we're sad, it's over, we still have some fashion moments that we can not get out of our heads. Every year stars come out and show their style at the awards red carpet after the award show Red Carpet, but the red carpet of the BET Awards is something special. When celebrities appear on this show, they really make it fashionable and they definitely improve their style game. This year's show, which took place on Sunday, was no exception. In fact, there were eight stars stunned on the carpet, which we could not stop thinking about.
